text:
Which of the following is most likely an advantage of the Herfindahl-Hirschman
Index relative to the N-firm concentration ratio? The Herfindahl-Hirschman
Index:
A. is simpler to calculate.
B. considers barriers to entry.
C. is more sensitive to mergers.
A market characterized by low barriers to entry, good substitutes, limited pricing
power, and marketing of product features is best characterized as:
A. oligopoly.
B. perfect competition.
C. monopolistic competition.
